name: Nerik The Slug
description:
Nerik has gone to panic-buy some lettuce. But alas! He has become trapped at the checkout, and must make a last desperate attempt to honour social distancing rules.

Easy to play but difficult to master, Nerik The Slug will be the greatest gastropod-based fun you will ever have in your entire life. And that's including snail racing!

If you enjoy the game you can install it at neriktheslug.com.
